summary: SummaryHighlightsClean Ingredientsma:nyo Panthetoin Essence Toner is a deep moisturizing essence toner formulated with Panthetoin, U-Oliosome, and other patented ingredients to keep the skin smooth and moisturized all day.
details: DetailsFeaturesA patented ingredient that helps to provide long-lasting hydration immediately.Loaded with moisturizing factors, skin barrier reparing ingredients.It is suitable for all skin types, especially for sensitive skin.Key IngredientsPanthetoin - Unique formulation of Panthenol (B5, 20,000 ppm) and Ectoin (5,000 ppm). It helps provide and retain moisture, keeping the skin moisturized all day.Ceramides - with smaller-than-pore particles, it helps to provide deep moisture and protect the skin barrier.Allantoin - helps soothe and soften rough skin, leaving it dead skin cells-free.Formulated WithoutFragrancesArtificial colorsParabenItem 2635110How To UsePour into palm and pat gently into the skin until fully absorbed.Apply two to three more layers for more moisture.IngredientsWater, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Methylpropanediol, Candida Bombicola/Glucose/Methyl Rapeseedate Ferment, Cynanchum Atratum Extract, Althea Rosea Flower Extract, Panthenol(4,000pm), Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Hellanthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, Allantoin, Ectoin(1,000pm), Ceramide NP, Hydroxyphenyl Propamidobenzoic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Bicarbonate, Calcium Chloride, Potassium Chloride, Phytosphingosine, Neopentyl Glycol Diethylhexanoate, Pentylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Betaine, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Caprylyl Glycol, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Triethylhexanoin, Tromethamine, Propanediol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Ethylhexylglycerin.
how_to_use: Pour into palm and pat gently into the skin until fully absorbed.Apply two to three more layers for more moisture.

reviews.headline: Hydration and Glow in a Bottle: Pathenol Essence Toner Revie
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been using Pathenol Essence Toner for a few weeks, and I'm honestly impressed. At 29, my skin is starting to show the first signs of dryness and uneven texture, and this toner has been a gentle but effective step in my routine.

The texture is lightweight and watery, which makes it easy to apply and absorb quickly without leaving any sticky residue. It soothes and hydrates immediately, leaving my skin feeling refreshed and soft. I also noticed my skin tone looking more even and calmer after consistent use.

What I really like is that it's gentle enough for sensitive skin but still gives that subtle plumpness and glow that I want at this age. It works beautifully under serum or moisturizer, and it feels like it preps my skin perfectly for the rest of my routine.

Overall, I'd recommend Pathenol Essence Toner for anyone in their late 20s looking for a hydrating, calming, and easy to use toner that supports skin health and early anti-aging care.

reviews.headline: Very good product but not suitable for my skin
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Thank You for free Manyo panthetoin essence Toner. Creamy consistency is easy to apply on face. I feed very hydrated after applying for few hours. Buy for my combination skin type and acne prone skin gets little oily later after few hours. I tried on my arms for hydration. It worked very well. I think I will use it further as body lotion toner.

reviews.headline: Patch test!
reviews.comments: This essence is a nice consistency, kind of milky and not at all sticky. I was excited to use this product, but unfortunately it did make me break out mildly so I've been reluctant to use again on my face. I don't have overly sensitive skin, so I am hoping to try this product again in a few weeks. I have been using on my neck and chest and it's very hydrating and rich without being heavy.

reviews.headline: Definitely one of my fav toners!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been using the ma:nyo Panthetoin Essence Toner for a while now, and I'm really impressed. The texture feels lightweight yet very hydrating, and it absorbs quickly without leaving any stickiness. My skin feels calm, refreshed, and well-moisturized throughout the day. I also love that it layers nicely with other skincare products, making it easy to include in my routine. This toner has definitely helped improve my skin's hydration and overall smoothness. Highly recommend if you're looking for a gentle but effective toner!

reviews.headline: Get it now!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is my first introduction to Korean skincare and I love it sooo much. My skin stays so hydrated all day and night and my skin glows without the help of a golden hour moment. It is a milky toner and it does get tacky when applied but it absorbs pretty quickly as well. You can apply multiple layers for more hydration if needed but the 1 layer is enough for me. I would definitely (and have) recommend this to everyone!

reviews.headline: A must have for my sensitive skin girlies!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This toner was immediately helpful from the first time I applied it on my skin. Normally I don't care for a toner with such a thick texture, but this one absorbs beautifully! It has been great for soothing any redness or irritation. It's also packed with moisture. I consider this a must have if our barrier care era!

reviews.headline: Glowy skin
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This toner has a very nice and not that watery consistency. You only need a little product to cover your face. It's easy to add to your routine as the first step after washing your face. It gets absorbed very fast. It plays well with my other products (Vit. C., moisturizer, sunblock, and makeup). The packaging looks clean and easy to use, I would say it is good quality. I have been using it for about a month (daily) and I know the bottle will last me at least 4 months so it's a good price. I do recommend it because I notice my skin has a little bit of glow and nice texture.

reviews.headline: Great Milky Toner
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I'm so glad that I got to try this Manyo Panthetoin Essence Toner. Before trying this product, I didn't use a toner daily, but this one has converted me. It's milky and moisturizing enough that I could swap out my daily moisturizer during the hot and humid summer months (I have combo skin that leans oily in the summer and drier in the winter). As the weather cools, I'm going to add my moisturizer back in and continue using this to will add an extra layer of moisture to my routine. I recommend this toner for people with skin like mine and I plan to repurchase it when I run out.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The packaging is very cute! It makes you look forward to opening. The bottle is a good size. Dispensing is easy on the hand which allows you to not be wasteful. It feels great on the face and leaves the skin feeling refreshed.

reviews.headline: Hydrating!!!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Nice texture, very light and hydrating. I have used it for some weeks and can testify that this is a great toner. I use it every morning and night before my serum and love it.

reviews.headline: Good but a little sticky
reviews.comments: This is pretty good but not my favorite. It does add hydration, but there is a slight stickiness to it. It wears well under makeup and is almost a good primer, more than something I want for my nighttime skin care routine. Love that it is formulated without fragrance.

reviews.headline: Soft milky toner!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This toner is creamy and totally different than most on the market. It is closer to a milky type toner than astringent and it is a thicker formula so it does not run off your face. To apply it, all you need to do is put a quarter size right on your hand and pat it directly into the skin. I use this at night and it definitely improves overall elasticity of the skin over time. The only quality I don't care for about this product is that it does take awhile to absorb into the skin and so my skin is very sticky afterwards so you need to give time for the product to absorb and dry down. I would definitely try this product over an extended period of time to improve skin texture and elasticity!

reviews.headline: Significant difference in my complexion!
reviews.comments: I love this toner! It's scentless but has a nice smooth texture. It leaves my skin feeling refreshed and soft. The bottle is just a flup cap and pour into your hands. Be careful not to pour too much, its a little watery, like most toners. I use my hands but you could also use a cotton pad. But I use this every si gle day and have noticed a significant different in my complexion.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product and recommended to my friends and
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This product is amazing I have dry face and it's works like magic for me and the packaging is very pretty and professional it's a 10/10 it's absolutely a most have

reviews.headline: Amazing toner!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is one of my favorite toners I've ever tried! I love the thicker texture. It's extremely hydrating but not heavy at all. Throughout the summer I've even used it as my only moisturizer and it's been perfect. It's very soothing and has a great list of hydrating ingredients to support the skin barrier.

reviews.headline: Great product for dry skin!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is a great product for dry skin. It works well as part of a skincare routine or as skin prep for underneath makeup. Really gives a beautiful glow without feeling greasy.

reviews.headline: Lightweight and moisturizing
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I absolutely loved using this product! It comes out clear, and is very light weight and moisturizing. Highly recommend during the summer as well, as it doesn't have an oily feel to it!

reviews.headline: Good toner!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I liked this overall. The texture was nice and it felt refreshing. My skin did love it. Liked the ingredients and I felt it was a fair price. It will last a while. I didn't notice a big difference in hydration, but I only used it for a few weeks.

reviews.headline: Super moisturizing!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Love this toner! It's an essence toner so it's super moisturizing and saves you time. I started using this and have been seeing a huge difference in my skin!

reviews.headline: Moisturizing Toner!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is one of the softest toners I've ever used. Usually toners strip the skin but this one keeps my skin nice and moist. I do still use a moisturizer afterwards but it almost feels like it's not needed.

faceoff_positive.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I recently started using the PANTHETOIN Essence Toner, and it has been nothing short of transformative for my skincare regimen. Here's why I'm absolutely thrilled about it:

Hydration Powerhouse. The toner is incredibly hydrating. It leaves my skin feeling refreshed and plumped right after application, making it an excellent base for the rest of my skincare products. I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall moisture level of my skin.

Lightweight and Absorbent. Despite its hydrating properties, the essence is incredibly lightweight. It absorbs quickly into the skin without leaving any sticky residue, which is perfect for my morning rush routine.

It's so gentle and soothing. I have sensitive skin, and I'm often cautious about trying new products. However, this toner proved to be gentle and soothing, with no irritation or redness even on my most sensitive days. It's formulated to calm the skin, which is perfect after a stressful day or exposure to harsh environments.

Packed with beneficial ingredients, PANTHETOIN really lives up to its promise of providing essential nutrients to the skin. I appreciate that it incorporates high-quality, skin-loving components that nourish and enhance my skin's health.

After a few days , the improvements in my skin's texture and tone were visibly noticeable. It's brighter, firmer, and more even, which has given me a confidence boost! One of the standout features is its versatility in layering. Whether I apply one layer for a light touch or several for intensive care, this toner seamlessly integrates with my other products.

Overall, the PANTHETOIN Essence Toner deserves a spot in everyone's skincare arsenal. With its exceptional hydrating and soothing properties, it's perfect for any skin type. Highly recommended for anyone looking to enhance their skin's appearance and health!
faceoff_positive.headline: A refreshing game changer for my skin care routine

faceoff_negative.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I had high hopes for the Ma:nyo Panthtoin Essence Toner after hearing great things about the brand, and while it's not a bad product, it didn't quite wow me. The packaging is sleek and minimal, and I like that it's vegan and made in Korea. The texture is light and absorbs fairly quickly, making it pleasant to use in the morning without feeling sticky. It has a chemical smell rather than a nice light scent to which I don't care for. 

However, I didn't notice a big difference in my skin's hydration or texture compared to other toners I've tried in the same price range. 
It's gentle and non-irritating, but the results were more "maintenance" than "transformative." For the cost, I was hoping for something that delivered more noticeable radiance or plumpness.

Overall, it's a decent everyday toner if you want something mild and hydrating, but it may not be the game-changer you're looking for.
faceoff_negative.headline: Decent toner
